# Hidden Speech (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Language-Dependent Spells|language-dependent]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]], [[3rd Level Inquisitor Spells|Inquisitor 3]], [[2nd Level Witch Spells|Witch 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 6]], [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M/DF (a cipher written on a piece of parchment)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** You plus one creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 227

You greatly enhance the ability of the subjects to communicate hidden messages to each other. Each target gains a +10 competence bonus on [[Bluff (Skill)|Bluff]] checks to send secret message to other recipients. Others using opposed [[Sense Motive (Skill)|Sense Motive]] checks to decipher these messages receive a â€“5 penalty. All subjects affected by the spell must share a language to be able to pass messages.
